mindwandering_english_Metadata.Description: Mindwandering survey 22 item responses and reaction times (post-restingstate (i.e., 'RS_MW'... includes VMP1 & VMP2) and post-movie (i.e., 'MOV_MW'... includes VMP2 only)) & post-movie emotion/attractiveness ratings (i,e., 'MOV_Rating'... VMP2 only)

RS_MW_1.Units: sliding scale 0-100 (0 = Not at all, 100 = Completely)

MOV_Rating_1.Description: 'During the movie, rate the maximum intensity you felt for each descriptor: Anxious' (Anxious)
MOV_Rating_1.Units: sliding scale 0-100 (0 = Not at all, 100 = Very much so)
